text:
The Influencing Others training from ILS was truly eye-opening for our sales team. Not only are they closing deals more effectively, but we've also seen a significant 15% increase in successful negotiations. This training has empowered them to understand and adapt to different influencing styles, which has been instrumental in building stronger relationships with clients.

What's equally impressive is how the Growth Mindset program has complemented this training. By fostering a culture that values continuous learning and resilience, our team is now more adept at handling challenges and embracing new opportunities. The combination of these two programs has been the key to achieving great results across the company. Our team members are more confident in their ability to influence without authority, and they're consistently demonstrating a growth mindset that drives innovation and collaboration.

Leadership development is extremely critical for any business in the current world as it needs leaders with right mindset to navigate through challenging situations through innovations and growth mindset. The growth mindset makes leaders to be open to learn, continuously curios for innovation and focus towards solutions.
I see Integrated Learning Systems (ILS) covers the full spectrum of leadership behaviours in their approach on learning. Their value propositions make them unique and different in the niche space of leadership development. I wish them all the best in their endeavours.
Enjoyed the Growth Mindset Course. It's straight to the point and actionable. Recommended to my new company for corporate training as well
The growth mindset course was great. Have attended different corporate training providers in the past, this is my favorite.
best growth mindset course in singapore. enjoyed the sessions a lot. 5 stars
